items.summary: Create a proposal document (no code changes) that redesigns Onebit from scratch while preserving the same core goal and session format, and proposes an expanded set of deterministic (rule-based) “AI-like” capabilities plus wellness/burnout/overwhelm support for user approval before implementation. Add the document to the repo as `frontend/REDESIGN_PROPOSAL.md`.

In `frontend/REDESIGN_PROPOSAL.md`, include a complete end-to-end UX specification for the redesigned Onebit flow, showing each screen’s purpose, primary decision, required inputs, and outputs, and how the flow adapts when the user is stuck/overwhelmed/burned out. The flow must use both free text and structured inputs (“everything”) to better understand user state.

In `frontend/REDESIGN_PROPOSAL.md`, include a feature inventory decision table that re-evaluates all current Onebit features from zero and marks each as: Keep, Modify, Remove, or Postpone. The proposal must explicitly remove the “Try Demo” / demo mode entrypoint and the 3 canned demo sessions from the intended product experience.
